articles.description: Novak Djokovic, the No. 1 seed, is attempting to win his eighth Wimbledon championship, which would match Roger Federer’s record.

articles.title: Corbin Carroll exits with right shoulder injury vs. Rays - MLB.com
articles.description:
PHOENIX -- The D-backs fell to the Rays, 6-1, on Thursday afternoon to drop their second straight series, but it could have been worse for Arizona. Far, far worse.
